resources.string: Ko mātou ngā Kaitiaki o te Kākāpō e waihanga ana i tētahi taupānga hei tautoko i a Oranga Tamariki i ngā tangohanga haumaru o ngā tamariki. Ko tā mātou whāinga he whakapai ake i te tukunga atu o te pārongo i te wā e kawea atu ana tētahi tamaiti i tētahi taiao mōrearea. E hiahia ana mātou kia māmā ake ēnei wā uaua, kia mārama hoki ki te katoa.

Ko tā mātou whāinga he tautoko i ngā tamariki, ngā whānau, me ngā kaimahi i ngā mahi haumaru mā te tuku pārongo māmā, mārama, me te rangimārie mā te taupānga. E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakaiti i te taumahatanga me te rangirua, kia āwhina i te whakahaere i ngā tangohanga kia tau, kia mōhio hoki.

Ko te kawe he tukanga e nekehia ai ngā tamariki, rangatahi rānei i tō rātou kāinga nā runga i ngā take haumaru, ture hoki.

Ngā momo Kawe:
• Kawe ohorere – ka puta i te wā he mōrearea tonu kei te tamaiti.
• Kawe i whakamaheretia – ka mahia i muri i te arotakenga me te whakamahere tahi me te whānau, kāwanatanga.
• Kawe ā-tau – mō te wā poto hei tiaki i te tamaiti.
• Kawe whai mana – i raro i te mana whakahaere a Oranga Tamariki.

Whakamārama:

He Aha te Kawe?
Ko te kawe he ārahi me te whakahaere i te neke o ngā tamariki hei tiaki i tō rātou oranga. Ka whakamahia i ngā wā pērā i te neke atu i ngā wāhi haumaru, haere mā runga waka rererangi, rānei, i runga anō i te arotakenga mōrearea.

Āhea ka hiahiatia ai?
Ka hiahiatia te kawe ina:
• Kei te mōrearea te taiao e noho ana te tamaiti.
• Me neke atu rātou ki tētahi atu kāinga haumaru.
• Ka kitea i te arotakenga he take nui te kawe.

Ngā Tukanga
• Me whai whakaaetanga mai i te kaiwhakahaere.
• Me rua pea ngā kaimahi kawe kua whakangungua.
• Me aro ki te ira, te ahurea, me ngā matea motuhake.
• Me whakamōhio i te tamaiti me te whānau mō ngā whakamahere, mena ka taea.
• Ka taea hoki te whakamahi i te hui ā-ataata hei whakakapi.

E whai ana te kawe i tētahi tukanga ture hei tiaki i ngā motika o te tamaiti.

1. Arotake me te Mahere
Ka arotakehia te haumaru me ngā mōrearea, kātahi ka mahia he mahere.

2. Pānui me te Whakaaetanga
Ka whakamōhiotia te whānau me te whai wā ki te whai wāhi, ki te whakaae rānei.

3. Whakamanatanga Ture
Ka hiahiatia pea he whakahau a te kooti hei whakahaere i te kawe.

4. Whakahaere Kawe
Ka kawea te tamaiti e ngā kaimahi kua whakangungua i raro i ngā tikanga tika.

5. Arotake me te Tautoko
Ka arotakehia te kawe me te tuku tautoko ki te whānau i muri mai.

Ina tīmata te kawe a Oranga Tamariki, me mōhio ngā mātua ki ō rātou motika.

Mōhio: Me whakamōhiotia ngā mātua i te tīmatanga o te tukanga.
Whai wāhi: Me āhei ngā mātua ki te whai wāhi ki ngā whakataunga.
Tautoko ture: Me āhei ki te rōia, me te āwhina ture mena e tika ana.
Wero i ngā whakataunga: Ka taea e ngā mātua te tono ki te Kōti Whānau mēnā kāore rātou i te whakaae.
Whakapā: Me āhei ki te whakapā atu ki te tamaiti mena e pai ana ki te oranga o te tamaiti.
Ratonga tautoko: Ka āhei hoki ki ngā ratonga pērā i te whāngai āwhina, ngā hōtaka mātua hoki.

He wāhi nui tō ngā kaitiaki i te tiaki i te tamaiti. He motika anō hoki tō rātou.

Mōhio: Me whakamōhiotia rātou mō te kawe.
Kōrero: Me āhei ki te kī atu i ō rātou whakaaro me ngā māharahara.
Tautoko: Me tuku tautoko pērā i te tohutohu ture me te āwhina hinengaro.
Mōhiohio ture: Me āhei ki te mōhiohio e pā ana ki ngā ture.
Whakaute: Me whakaute i ngā kaitiaki, ā, me whakamanatia ā rātou mahi ki te tamaiti.
Mō ētahi atu kōrero, haere ki

Ehara a Kauri te Kākāpō i te āhua anake — ko ia te tohu o te haumaru, te arataki, me te whakamarie i te wā o te pōuritanga.

I tupu a Kauri i tētahi ngahere whakamarumaru e kī ana i te manaaki me te whakawhirinaki. Ka rongo ia i ngā tamariki kei te raru, nā reira ka noho hei hoa whakamana mō rātou.

Kei roto ia i tēnei taupānga hei hoa māmā mō ngā tamariki kia mārama rātou ki ngā mea e pā ana ki a rātou. Mā ana kōrero me ngā āwhina, ka noho haumaru ake te tamaiti.

Ahakoa he iti, he tohu a Kauri mō te maia, aroha, me te manawanui.

Ko ngā pārongo kei roto i tēnei taupānga he mōhiotanga whānui noa iho. Kāore mātou e kī ana he tika, he mārohirohi, he pono rānei ngā mōhiotanga katoa.\n\nMā te pāwhiri ki te "Whakaae", ka whakaae koe ki ngā herenga o tēnei panui.
He tukanga haumaru te kawe hei tiaki i ngā tamariki e hāere ana me ngā mōrearea kei mua i a rātou.
Ka mahia he whakamahere, he arotake mōrearea, me te kōwhiri i ngā kaimahi kia haumaru te haerenga.
He motika tō ngā mātua kia mōhio, kia whai wāhi rānei, ahakoa ngā here a te kooti.
He tika tō ngā kaitiaki kia mōhio, kia whai wāhi hoki ki te oranga o te tamaiti, ahakoa te haerenga.
Tēnā tāuru i te pātai ki konei.
Me rua neke atu ngā kaimahi ārahi kua whakangungua ki ngā tikanga whakatau raruraru me te haumaru mō ia ārahi hunga taiohi?
Me rite tonu te ira o ngā kaimahi ārahi ki te tamaiti, rangatahi rānei e ārahitia ana?
Mō ngā haerenga rererangi e pā ana ki te hunga taiohi, me whakamanatia tētahi kaimahi ārahi ki te kawe here me te mōhio ki te whakamahi?
Ka taea e ngā kaimahi ārahi te whakatutuki i ā rātou mahi ahakoa kāore he aromatawai mō te tūraru i mahia?
I te wā e ārahitia ana, ko te oranga tonutanga o te tamaiti, rangatahi rānei te aronga matua, tae atu ki ngā tūnga whakamaherehia me te whakamarie?
Mō ngā ārahi i muri i ngā haora mahi, me whai whakaaetanga mai i te National Contact Centre mēnā kāore i whakamaheretia te ārahi?
Ki te uru mai tētahi whare noho taiohi ki te ārahi mā runga rererangi, me whakangungua tētahi kaimahi ārahi ki te kawe here me te mōhio ki te whakamahi?
Me whakamahere me te tuhi i ngā tūnga katoa, tae atu ki ngā wā kai me ngā wā kaukau, e ngā kaimahi ārahi?
Me mātua whai waea pūhiko kī katoa me ngā taipitopito whakapā ohotata ngā kaimahi ārahi?
Me noho hei kawenga mā ngā kaimahi ārahi te tiaki i te tamaiti, rangatahi rānei i ngā wā katoa, tae atu ki ngā wā okioki?
"Kua tae kē koe ki te pātai tuatahi!"
Ehara i te kino! Kia kaha tonu.
Whakamātauria anō – ka tae atu koe!
Kua hurihia te reo ki te Reo Māori
